name: Recent Posts
author: aumsrini

sections.description:
Recent posts is a vertical ticker in reponsive mode.Recent posts allows you to show your recent post in vertical ticker mode.Recent posts have various options in admin section to set speed,direction,no.of recent posts to show and interval.
Recent posts is widely used for show your latest post in reponsvie.Recent posts is fully customizable to match your theme.You can also control to set direction,ticker speed,number of post to visible and ticker interval.

  1. Use the shortcode [vertical_post_ticker]code in your posts or pages.

  2. Use this <?php echo do_shortcode(['vertical_post_ticker]'); ?>in your templates directly.

Features

  • Responsive
  • Work with all browsers
  • Set Direction.
  • Ticker Speed.
  • Set no.of posts to visible.
  • Interval for Ticker.

Support
If you face any bugs ? then visit here http://beeplugins.com/contact-us to solve your issue .

  • Thumbnail Height and width

  • Border Size
  • Border Color
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-vertical-post-ticker to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the shortcode [vertical_post_ticker] in your posts or pages.
  4. Use this <?php echo do_shortcode(['vertical_post_ticker]'); ?> in your templates directly.

Admin Settings

After Activate the plugin Go to Settings–>Vertical Ticker Settings
sections.faq:
Can i change the directions of Ticker ?

Yes, you can change it with two options like up and down.

Is there any option to set, how many post to show in ticker ?

Yes,you can set the number of post to show n ticker through admin settings

Can i able switch to horizontal mode ?

No, Now we only have option for vertical.
